title: Algebraic Problem-Solving Strategies Using Multiplicative Properties

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Interactive learning environment using smartphone-based VR simulations, where students explore and discuss application cases of physical properties in virtual spaces and experience real problem-solving processes

learning_goals: Students can accurately define the zero product property (ZPP) and use it to find solutions to quadratic equations
Students can distinguish the concept of zero-divisors without misinterpreting the inverse of the zero product property
Students can analyze various mathematical situations where the zero product property applies in virtual simulation environments and apply these to real-world problem-solving

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
